instructions:
Cook rice according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a wok or skillet over high heat. Add the meat, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and cook stirring and tossing for 4 minutes.
Add vegetables and toss for another 1-2 minutes.
Pour in the teriyaki marinade and cook, stirring for an additional 1-2 minutes. Serve over white rice.
title: Teriyaki Chicken Stir-Fry
